videos.lesson: Absolute Beginner French for Every Day
videos.description: In this fast-paced and fun series you'll learn the most popular French phrases.
Are you a Lya fan? Here are her best video lessons.
We'll give you the key to mastering beginner-level rules.

videos.lesson: Learn French: The Top 10 Superstitions and Beliefs
videos.description: Lidia explains some of the most well-known French superstitions and beliefs.

videos.lesson: Quick & Easy French Review for Beginners
videos.description: You may have forgotten some of these words and phrases. Brush up now!
Try your hand at reading real French in context.
Learn the 800 most common words and phrases with this video series.

videos.lesson: Words of the Week with Lya for Beginners
videos.description: These fun, bite-sized lessons will get you speaking French in no time!
